Name: Azte Rich Ore
Description: After smelting, it can be converted into a larger quantity of Radiant Stones used for Refine.
Description2$english:
The color is dark gray with a yellowish tint, and the luster is slightly weak. The texture of the ore is relatively uniform, with no obvious flaws. Its moderate hardness makes it easy to cut and polish, which is precisely its charm.
Rich ores usually appear in clusters and have a much higher mineral content than ordinary raw stones, but their yield is lower, making them naturally more expensive.
